name: Cedar Peter the Backburner
description:
Cedar Peter the Backburner is a puzzle platformer scavenger hunt game created in 7 days for one of the old Unreal Engine 4 Game Jams based on the theme "However vast the darkness, we must supply our own light."

This game was created to answer a simple question:
Who lights all the torches in the ancient and forgotten temples and ruins?
You do, for you are a Backburner. And you don't get paid enough for it.

Credits:
Art - MetricZero
Programming - Zope
Music - tfx
